column4: i was told that the manager is already running. maybe i'm trying to do the wrong thing. how could i switch to the graphics mode if i chose to log in from the console?
would i need to quit irssi to try that ccombination?
in that case, it doesn nothing.
would it be possible to use the console at the same time as using irssi? i'm thinking i could do that using screen, but that'd mean i'd have to disconnect again.
you could use screen or have several consoles.  Just use Ctrl+Alt+F<number> to switch
i.e. the first terminal is Ctrl+Alt+F1 and the sixth is Ctrl+Alt+F6
ok. "process 0 (ps aux | grep X) terminated with return code 0"
same thing. was it correct of me to change ?dm to kdm-kde4?
actually, i don't think that's what i'm supposed to say. well, it said the same thing as before.
I'm not sure what's going on or how to fix it
